column4: Hi guys! My gateway has two interfaces. One with dhcp which deliver inet connection. the other for sharing on the local network (static ip). I also have a dns server on the local network. How can i get the gateway to use my local dns server? dhcp for eth1 just overwrites resolv.conf
dhcp on eth1 removes it on every boot up
add it to the data the dhcpd kicks out ;)
